text: Louise McBee (June 15, 1924 â€“ March 2, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. She was a member of the Georgia House of Representatives from 1993 to 2005. McBee was born in Strawberry Plains, Tennessee. McBee died on March 2, 2021, in Athens, Georgia at age 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Louise McBee
